title: Mastery Page Error
body:
I have recently encountered an issue which occurred multiple times during champion selection.
Basically whenever I get into champion selection after viewing another player's mastery page, my usual mastery page selection dropbox will display that player's mastery selections instead of mine, it'll also give me and error when I choose one of them simply cos they don't exist to my account.
The first time I encountered this error I couldn't manage to select the mastery page correctly and resulted using the wrong mastery page for the game.
The second time I clicked on edit mastery and entered my mastery page and when I closed the edit I was able to use the correct mastery page that I closed on.

This is probably not a major issue and can be fixed by using edit or just avoid it if I'm aware of the error but its still an inconvenience and would be nice if it can be fixed.

Cheers
:)

replies.body:
Hey there,

This defnitely sounds like an annoying bug, the client is currently being rewritten from the ground up so it's probably not going to be worth reporting the issue, however if you wish to still submit a bug report then your thread would be better suited for the Report a Bug board over on NA.

Before making your thread there, please read the  "[How to Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/3mQGBEjA-how-to-report-a-game-bug)" pinned thread.
